businessSummary.oneLiner: Southeast Asia's largest e-commerce (Shopee), digital entertainment (Garena/Free Fire), and fintech (Monee) operator ‚Äî Singapore-based global internet company
businessSummary.description: Sea Limited is a Singapore-based global technology company operating e-commerce (Shopee), gaming (Garena), and digital finance (Monee) across Southeast Asia, Latin America, Taiwan, and beyond. TTM revenue $21.04B (+35.8% YoY), net income $1.42B marking a profitability turnaround. On 2/19, expanded Google AI strategic partnership MOU. On 2/27, the stock fell 2.2% to $108.45 amid inflation-driven selloff. Q4 2025 earnings due 3/3. All 12 analysts rate Strong Buy.
howTheyMakeMoney: Shopee: E-commerce fees, advertising, logistics (SPX Express) ‚Äî Q3 2025 revenue $3.8B (+36.6% YoY)
Garena: Free Fire in-game sales, publishing ‚Äî Q3 2025 revenue $653M (+31.2%), bookings $775M (+51%)
Monee (fka SeaMoney): Digital payments, lending, banking, insurance ‚Äî Q3 2025 revenue $990M (+60.8%)
keyProducts: Shopee ‚Äî #1 e-commerce in SE Asia & LatAm (2024 SE Asia GMV 52%)
Garena Free Fire ‚Äî Global mobile battle royale (bookings +51% YoY)
Monee/ShopeePay ‚Äî Digital payments & financial services (loan book $7.9B, +70%)
SeaBank ‚Äî Digital banking in Indonesia & Philippines

keyMetrics.name: P/E (TTM)
keyMetrics.interpretation: Based on EPS $2.29. Reasonable for high-growth emerging tech

keyMetrics.name: Forward P/E
keyMetrics.interpretation: Based on FY2026 EPS estimate of $4.27. Attractive vs growth

keyMetrics.name: Revenue Growth
keyMetrics.interpretation: 3 consecutive quarters of 30%+ growth. Q4 results due 3/3

growthDrivers.title: Shopee SE Asia GMV 52% ‚Äî dominant #1 expanding
growthDrivers.description: 2024 SE Asia GMV share 52% (up from 48%, +4pp). Shopee captured $12B of $14B new GMV. Q3 2025 GMV $32.2B (+28%), 5th consecutive all-time high.

growthDrivers.title: Google AI strategic partnership ‚Äî Agentic Shopping, AP2 payments
growthDrivers.description: Expanded MOU with Google on 2/19. Shopee: Gemini-based Agentic Shopping prototype. Garena: AI game development. Monee: Agent Payments Protocol (AP2) adoption.

growthDrivers.title: Monee (fintech) hypergrowth ‚Äî Off-Shopee SPayLater +300%
growthDrivers.description: Q3 revenue +60.8%, loan book $7.9B (+70%), NPL 1.1% stable. Off-Shopee SPayLater +300% YoY ‚Äî evolving into independent fintech platform.

growthDrivers.title: Q4 earnings 3/3 ‚Äî growth momentum catalyst
growthDrivers.description: Before market open 3/3. Third consecutive quarter of 30%+ growth could trigger valuation re-rating. Barclays maintains Buy.

competitiveAdvantage.summary: Integrated SE Asian e-commerce, gaming, and fintech ecosystem is the core moat. Shopee-Monee-Garena cross-synergies and proprietary logistics (SPX Express) create barriers. GMV 52% vs. #2 TikTok Shop (~18%).

moats.description: Shopee's two-sided buyer-seller network and SPX Express logistics. 2024 SE Asia GMV 52%.
Language, payments, logistics, and regulatory optimization across 11 SE Asian markets. Strong local edge vs. Temu, Amazon.
Integrated e-commerce, payments, lending, and gaming data for AI personalization. Enhanced by Google AI partnership.

competitors.name: TikTok Shop
competitors.detail: SE Asia e-commerce #2, GMV ~18%. Strong in live commerce.

competitors.name: Lazada (Alibaba)
competitors.detail: Fallen to SE Asia #3. Overtaken by TikTok Shop.

competitors.name: Temu (PDD Holdings)
competitors.detail: Ultra-low-price cross-border. Entering SE Asia and Brazil. MAU +55%.

competitors.name: MercadoLibre
competitors.detail: LatAm #1 e-commerce and fintech. Direct Shopee competitor in Brazil.

competitors.name: Grab Holdings
competitors.detail: SE Asian super app. Indirect fintech competition with Monee.

recentNews.headline: SE -2.2% ‚Äî inflation surprise weighs on emerging tech stocks
recentNews.significance: PPI above expectations. Negative for emerging market growth stocks. Wait-and-see ahead of Q4 results 3/3.

recentNews.headline: 'Why Sea Limited is an investment bet' ‚Äî Insider Monkey analysis
recentNews.significance: Highlights Shopee's 52% Southeast Asian GMV share, Monee fintech growth, PEG 0.40 undervaluation.

recentNews.headline: Q4 2025 earnings due March 3 ‚Äî credit cost concerns
recentNews.significance: Strong Shopee momentum but rising credit costs, operating expenses, and FX headwinds.

recentNews.headline: Morgan Stanley: Shopee GMV growth to exceed 20% in 2026
recentNews.significance: Morgan Stanley projects structural growth continuation. Wider customer base emphasized.

recentNews.headline: Google AI strategic partnership MOU expanded
recentNews.significance: Agentic Shopping, Android Pay integration, and AI/payments collaboration expansion.

analystOpinions.notableComment: All 12 analysts Strong Buy. Consensus $189 (+75%). Q4 results on 3/3 as catalyst. Morgan Stanley, Barclays both emphasize structural growth.

risks.title: Q4 earnings uncertainty ‚Äî credit costs and FX headwinds
risks.description: Results due 3/3. Rising credit costs, operating expenses, and Southeast Asian currency weakness risks.

risks.title: Inflation surprise ‚Äî emerging growth stock weakness
risks.description: PPI above expectations, rate cut hopes fading. Negative for emerging market growth stocks.

risks.title: Temu and TikTok Shop competition intensifying
risks.description: Southeast Asian e-commerce competition heating up. Potential margin pressure for Shopee.

risks.title: Gaming revenue share declining
risks.description: Garena revenue share shrinking. Free Fire sustained growth uncertain.

buyReasons.title: PEG 0.40 ‚Äî extreme undervaluation vs growth
buyReasons.rationale: 35%+ growth at P/E 47. Rare valuation among growth stocks.

buyReasons.title: Q4 earnings catalyst (3/3) ‚Äî consensus beat potential
buyReasons.rationale: Shopee GMV at 5 consecutive all-time highs. Earnings surprise probability.

buyReasons.title: All 12 analysts Strong Buy ‚Äî consensus +75%
buyReasons.rationale: Target $189. Maximum upside potential from current price.

buyReasons.title: Net cash $5.66B + P/FCF 15x
buyReasons.rationale: Southeast Asia's largest e-commerce player with strong cash generation. Sufficient valuation safety margin.

overallOpinion: Sea Limited fell 2.2% to $108.45 amid the inflation-driven selloff. Not far from its 52-week low of $99.50.
PEG 0.40 and P/FCF 15x represent extreme undervaluation for a 35%+ growth company. All 12 analysts at Strong Buy with consensus +75% highlights the disconnect between fundamentals and price.
The key catalyst is the Q4 earnings release on 3/3. If Shopee GMV growth and Monee profitability exceed expectations, a re-rating is possible. FX headwinds and credit costs remain near-term risks.
